name: gitmini
description: Minimal automated approach to GIT (git publish, git unpublish)

scripts.postinstall: git config --global alias.publish '!gm publish' && git config --global alias.unpublish '!gm unpublish' && git config --global alias.start '!gm start' && git config --global alias.refresh '!gm refresh' && git config --global alias.current '!gm current'

author: andreafuturi
